alert.note: Alert for Price; Sawyer (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 6:25PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Price and southeastern Sawyer Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 625 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles west of Fifield, to 13 miles southeast of Winter, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Fifield around 645 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Phillips and Catawba. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
